alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 8:31PM CDT until October 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN AND NORTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 830 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Echo, or 9 miles north of Waldron, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Mansfield... Echo... Caulksville... Barber... Lucas... Chismville... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... Elm Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
